articles.title: Vietnamese boy trapped in concrete pit still out of reach after nearly three days - The Star Online
articles.description: HANOI (Vietnam News/Asia News Network): Local authorities were still racing against time on Tuesday to rescue a 10-year-old boy trapped in a 35m-deep concrete pipe pit in the southern province of Dong Thap since Saturday (Dec 24) afternoon.

articles.title: Singapore dollar to tussle with baht for best regional currency - The Straits Times
articles.description:
The Singdollar was the only Asian currency to appreciate against the US dollar last year.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:

articles.title: Can you get diabetes from eating too much sugar? - Lifestyle Asia Hong Kong
articles.description: Sugar alone doesn’t cause diabetes. However, it does have an indirect effect on insulin resistance or diabetes.
articles.content: Eating too much sugar doesn’t directly cause diabetes. However, there is a correlation (association) between being overweight or having obesity and type 2 diabetes. Over time, consuming too many food… [+13713 chars]
